title: Manage a Design Change Notice (DCN)
description: A design change is required after a drawing has already been issued. A formal DCN must be created to track the change.

tasks.description: Create a new DCN in the system, linking it to the affected drawing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates a new DCN record.

tasks.description: Describe the change and the reason for it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer clearly documents the required change.

tasks.description: Submit the DCN for approval. Once approved, the DCN will be attached to the next revision of the drawing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the DCN, which enters an approval workflow.
